      • culminating.Boss

    public class Boss
extends MovingObject
    Boss.java This class will store data and create a boss. June 18, 2018

    • Constructor Detail

      • Boss

        public Boss(double x,
            double y,
            int left,
            int right,
            int top,
            int bottom,
            boolean bounce)
        Constructs a new boss that stores information.
        Parameters:
        x - Initial x position.
        y - Initial y position.
        left - Left edge for bouncing.
        right - Right edge for bouncing.
        top - Top edge for bouncing.
        bottom - Bottom edge for bouncing.

      • atk1

        public void atk1(double angle,
                 boolean bounce)
        shoots bullets in at angles around the boss
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle between the bullet vectors
        bounce - whether or not the bullet will bounce on collision with the edge of the canvas

      • atk2

        public void atk2(int projectileType,
                 double playerX,
                 double playerY,
                 int shots,
                 double anglewidth,
                 boolean bounce)
        attacks in a cone directed towards the character
        Parameters:
        projectileType - the type of attack cone; laser or projectile
        playerX - the x location of the player
        playerY - the y location of the player
        shots - the number of shots to be made in the cone attack
        anglewidth - the angle width of the cone
        bounce - whether or not the bullet will bounce on collision with the edge of the canvas

      • atk3

        public void atk3(double playerX,
                 double playerY)
        makes a laser attack at the player
        Parameters:
        playerX - the x location of the player
        playerY - the y location of the player
